title: Week 7 Bets, Latest On Luck, Super Bowl Rematch (Football 10/20)
description:
Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco, Will Brinson and Jason La Canfora make their Week 7 picks against the spread, while discussing DeShone Kizer back as the Browns starting QB (7:18), the latest on Andrew Luck, as the Colts prepare to face the Jaguars (11:52), and a typically hard-fought AFC North battle between the Steelers and Bengals (20:07). The conversation and wagers continue on Ravens-Vikings (24:37), Bucs-Bills (29:30), the Aaron Rodgers-less Packers against the Saints (34:52), the Cowboys who will have Zeke Elliott visiting the 49ers (41:35), and Giants vs. Seahawks (47:00). The bets conclude with primetime games featuring a Super Bowl rematch between the Patriots and Falcons, and divisional rivalry as the Eagles host the Redskins (55:28).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
